children: , bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ abhāvitaṃ
. Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, abhāvitaṃ akammaniyaṃ hotī’’ti. Paṭhamaṃ.
innerText: 21. ‘‘Nāhaṃ , bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ abhāvitaṃ akammaniyaṃ hoti yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ [yathayidaṃ cittaṃ (sī. pī.) evamuparipi]. Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, abhāvitaṃ akammaniyaṃ hotī’’ti. Paṭhamaṃ.

children: . ‘‘Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ bhāvitaṃ kammaniyaṃ hoti yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ. Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, bhāvitaṃ kammaniyaṃ hotī’’ti. Dutiyaṃ.
innerText: 22. ‘‘Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ bhāvitaṃ kammaniyaṃ hoti yathayidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ. Cittaṃ, bhikkhave, bhāvitaṃ kammaniyaṃ hotī’’ti. Dutiyaṃ.
